summary: Paul Karrer  was a Swiss biochemist best known for his work on vitamins.
full_text: Robert Joseph Lefkowitz  is an American physician and biochemist. He is best known for his groundbreaking discoveries that reveal the inner workings of an important family G protein-coupled receptors, for which he was awarded the 2012 Nobel Prize for Chemistry with Brian Kobilka. He is currently an Investigator with the Howard Hughes Medical Institute as well as a James B. Duke Professor of Medicine and Professor of Biochemistry and Chemistry at Duke University.
title: Robert Lefkowitz
